user_instruction: 'Send Mark an update on the current candidates for the engineering team position. You can check out my Notion for information. Mark'"'"'s email is mark.johnson@techcorp.com.'

formatted_items.content:
Hi Jane,

I hope you’re doing well. When you have a moment, could you please send me an update on the current candidates for the engineering team position? Feel free to pull any details you need from your Notion workspace.

Thank you very much!

Best,
Mark
